column5: The U.S. Federal Aviation Administration approved a certification plan developed by Lockheed Martin for its hybrid airships  the company said  taking it one step closer to starting commercial deliveries of the airships.

column4: McDonald's to debut new value menu in January amid turnaround

column5: CHICAGO  Nov 17 Monsanto expects to see corn seed prices increase by low single digits in local currencies for its corn seeds sold for the 2016 planting season  company president Brett Begemman said Tuesday.
